name: Resurrection Island: Love and Victory
description:
《Resurrection Island: Love and Victory》 is a game developed by さんかっけい and TJacky, created by the two of them with related art and programming.

In the game, you will play as a nameless knight who engages in battles with furry girls on a mysterious island, seeking lost memories and a way off the island.

You will battle against 8 furry girls, proving your abilities through challenges and gaining their recognition.

■CG



The gameplay presents turn-based bullet-hell battles, where you interact with characters and scenes on the map to unlock 16 animated CGs featuring interactions with the furry girls.

It also includes a small amount of puzzle-solving elements, with gameplay taking place on pixel-style scenes.
